thread.title_full: ALTA Membership Expands with Addition of MTU MaintenanceTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: ALTA Membership Expands with Addition of MTU MaintenanceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
ALTA Membership Expands with Addition of MTU Maintenance
The Latin American & Caribbean Air Transport Association (ALTA) welcomed MTU Maintenance as its newest Affiliate Member. MTU Maintenance, a division of MTU Aero Engines, is one of the leading providers of maintenance services for aircraft engines and industrial gas turbines with the largest engine portfolio worldwide.
“MTU Maintenance has been active in Latin America for over 17 years, and several member airlines are already trusting our high-quality MRO capabilities”, says Leo Koppers Senior Vice President MRO Programs. “We are proud that we have been accepted as a part of ALTA and are looking forward to working on new custom-tailored solutions for further members of the association as well.”
Eduardo Iglesias, Executive Director of ALTA, said, “We are pleased to welcome MTU Maintenance into ALTA’s member base, which steadily and consistently continues to develop. ALTA and its Members continue to work together to promote initiatives that ensure the region and its stakeholders realize the full economic benefits made possible by aviation by removing barriers and promoting a safe and efficient industry.”
